sentences.en: And Bath - sheba bowed, and did obeisance unto the king. And the king said, What wouldest thou?
sentences.cn: 王上1:16拔示巴向王屈身下拜. 王说 、 你要甚麽.

sentences.en: He made a deep obeisance to the queen.
sentences.cn: 他向女王深深鞠了一躬.

sentences.en: He made obeisance to the king.
Hold to do obeisance a rites after.
I'm so fortunately to be able to make obeisance to the emperor.
sentences.cn: 能够进天阙朝拜天子,真是三生有幸呀!

sentences.en: O embodiment of all, my obeisance unto You from the front and from the back.
sentences.cn: 一切的化身啊, 我从前方,后方,所有的方向上都向您鞠躬礼拜.

sentences.en: She also indicated that wants to obeisance Chen Yixun for Shi Xue a fluent Cantonese.
sentences.cn: 她还表示想拜陈奕迅为师学一口流利的广东话.

sentences.en: The ability to controll comes from obeisance of rules.
sentences.cn: 驾驭的能力来自于服从.

sentences.en: Three times it made obeisance before him, then It'spoke.
sentences.cn: 它对着他鞠了三躬, 开始说话了.

sentences.en: To her the Mullah made obeisance, and, kneeling before her, told his tale.
sentences.cn: 毛拉深鞠一躬, 跪在她面前, 讲述了自己的故事.

sentences.en: While he was still young and strong all paid obeisance to him.
sentences.cn: 他年轻力壮时所有人都对他毕恭毕敬。

trans.tran_en: respect and obedience to someone or something, often shown by bending your head or the upper part of your body
